Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Gallocin D (natural AMPs; two-chain class 2b bacteriocin, Gram-positive bacteria, prokaryotes; 1S=S, UCSS1a)
Sequence Information.Source: Streptococcus gallolyticusLL009, isolated from raw goat milk (new Zealand)

Literature Information.Literature: Chain B sequence (GllD2): DNITKGAYKLGKATRQAGKAIGKAIGKLF.Activity: display activity against S. gallolyticus DPC 6,501, S. pneumoniae, L. innocua DPC 1,768, E. faecalis E265, and E. faecium, a vancomycin resistant Enterococcus strain EC300 (anti-VRE).
Literature Information.Author: Hill D, O'Connor PM, Altermann E, Day L, Hill C, Stanton C, Ross RP. 2020
Literature Information.Title: Extensive bacteriocin gene shuffling in the Streptococcus bovis/Streptococcus equinus complex reveals gallocin D with activity against vancomycin resistant enterococci.
